description.value:
Others might look upon them with disdain, but you know that the weapons of your people are as effective as they are sharp. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Dogslicer]{Dogslicer} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Horsechopper]{Horsechopper}.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon goblin weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial goblin weapons are simple weapons and advanced goblin weapons are martial weapons.
